detail_desc: Set with a jacket and pair of trousers in thermal fleece made partly from recycled polyester. Jacket with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard and raglan sleeves. Trousers with covered elastication at the waist.
Vest top in airy slub linen jersey with a racer back and rounded hem.
Long-sleeved wrapover top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck and long ties at the waist that can be wound around the body several times.
Cargo joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, flap back and leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening, and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
V-neck top in soft slub jersey with short sleeves, a seam centre back and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Metal wallet chain with a carabiner hook at each end. Length approx. 54 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.
Pyjamas in soft, cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Lightweight boots in imitation suede with faux fur linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, front and back pockets and skinny legs.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the jacket is organic.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an intarsia motif on the front. Turned-up hem with a lenticular print.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in soft, stretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge, frayed hems.
Fitted top in organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a V-neck with a lace trim.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a lace yoke and rounded hem.
Soft fleece jacket designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and long raglan sleeves. Unlined.

Playsuit in sequin-embroidered mesh with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and long, wide sleeves. Opening and button at the back of the neck, a seam at the waist with narrow, covered elastication, and wide legs. Scalloped edges around the neckline, sleeves and hems. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Clamdiggers in a cotton Oxford weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly with a button. Front pockets, back pockets and shaping seams at the knees.
Short, straight-cut coat in bouclé made from a wool blend. Double-breasted with notch lapels and large patch front pockets. Lined.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with flounces at the sides and a high cut at the back.
Short dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, pleat at the front and 3/4-length sleeves with decorative trims and an opening and ties at the cuffs. Lined.
Ankle-length jeans in stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, a coin pocket, back pockets and wide, straight legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Set with a V-neck strappy top and pair of leggings in ribbed jersey. Top with adjustable shoulder straps and opening cups with space for nursing pads. Leggings with a low, wrapover waist. The top and leggings can be worn both during pregnancy and when nursing afterwards.
Short, wide top in crushed velvet with a V-neck front and back.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a high stand-up collar, zip at the top, long raglan sleeves with elbow patches, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Long jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Jumper in a soft, textured knit with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sports trousers in fast-drying jersey with wide elastication at the waist, side pockets, a slightly lower crotch and tapered legs.
Treggings in stretch cotton corduroy with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with a print motif, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in a cotton weave with wide elastication at the back. Opening with a wide tie at the top, buttons down the front and long cuffed sleeves.

Hi-tops in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue, adjustable hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved Henley tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with a button placket.
Double-breasted coat in a sturdy weave with notch lapels, flap front pockets and a single back vent. Unlined.
Swimsuit with a lined gusset.
Long-sleeved satin blouse with a small stand-up collar, concealed press-studs on one shoulder, seam at the waist and asymmetric hem.
Cropped top in a crinkled weave with decorative buttons at the front, narrow, tie-top shoulder straps and smocking at the top and hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Sleeveless jersey dress in a short and fitted style.
Sleeveless dress in sequin-embroidered tulle with a wide neckline that is slightly deeper at the back. Concealed zip at the back and a seam at the waist with a satin tie belt. Lined.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey.
Ankle-length jeans in soft, washed denim. High, elasticated paper bag waist with a small frill trim and detachable tie belt, and wide, straight legs.
Treggings in stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Short dress in printed cotton jersey with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Ankle-length trousers in soft jersey with an elasticated waist, side pockets and gently tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Mittens in a soft knit containing glittery threads with a decorative bow on the front. Cotton lining.
Set with a top and skirt in soft, organic cotton jersey. Sleeveless top with a tie detail at the hem. Bell-shaped skirt with a visible elastic waistband. Unlined.
Cardigan in a soft knit with long sleeves, a wrapover front and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Fishnet socks with elasticated tops.
Wide top in a soft weave with a wide neckline with narrow elastication at the top and long, flared sleeves with smock details.
Tops in organic cotton jersey with a gathered neckline and short puff sleeves.
Moisturising lip balm in a box shaped like a unicorn. 3 g. Not for children under 3 years of age.
Ankle-length, pull-on trousers in superstretch cotton twill with covered elastication at the waist and a fake fly with a press-stud. Front and back pockets and wide, flared legs.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short top in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves. Contrasting colour trims around the neckline and sleeves.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, and flared legs with raw-edge hems.
Trainers with imitation leather details, a padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Long, round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey with a curved hem.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Vest top in soft, printed, stretch cotton jersey.
Short skirt in a checked weave with a visible zip at the back. Lined.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in organic cotton jersey with concealed press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Ankle-length trousers in superstretch jersey with a slight sheen. Low, elasticated waist with a decorative button, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Soft brushed inside.

Wide trousers in a soft wool weave. High waist with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and zip fly. Side pockets, two welt back pockets and straight legs with pleats at the top for volume.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and raw-edge hems.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Short dress in an airy, patterned weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with buttons at the top and a frilled collar with a drawstring at the front. Concealed zip in one side, a round, cut-out section at the back and long sleeves with elastication and a wide flounce at the cuffs. Seam at the hips and a skirt with pleats for width. Recycled polyester lining.
3/4-length trousers in stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and raw-edge frills at the hems.
Wide blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, decorative seams front and back and short cap sleeves.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey with a wide neckline, short raglan sleeves and smocking around the neckline, sleeves and hem..
Hat in a soft, cable knit with a faux fur pompom on top and a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Calf-length dress in an airy viscose weave. Round neckline with decorative gathers, and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Wide, elbow-length raglan sleeves. Unlined.
Short, straight-cut dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck and half-length sleeves with slits and ties. Unlined.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric. Tight fit. The top is made from recycled polyester.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with a heart-shaped button at the top, long sleeves and appliqués on the front.
Long-sleeved cardigan knitted in soft, organic cotton with a button at the neck.
